description: Jianxin, a Taoist monk and successor of Fengyiquan, has dedicated her life to mastering the ultimate martial art. With the power to harness and transform environmental Chi, she can create protective barriers that purify both body and mind.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Jianxin, một nữ tu Đạo giáo và là người kế thừa của Phong Diện Quyền, đã dành cả cuộc đời mình để lĩnh hội nghệ thuật võ thuật tối thượng. Với sức mạnh thu phục và biến đổi Khí trong môi trường, cô có thể tạo ra các lá chắn bảo vệ thanh lọc cả thể xác và tinh thần.
descriptionLocalized.id: Jianxin, seorang biarawan Tao dan penerus Fengyiquan, telah mengabdikan hidupnya untuk menguasai seni bela diri pamungkas. Dengan kekuatan untuk memanfaatkan dan mengubah Chi lingkungan, ia dapat menciptakan penghalang pelindung yang memurnikan tubuh dan pikiran.
descriptionLocalized.th: เจี้ยนซิน ภิกษุณีเต๋าและทายาทของเฟิงอี้เฉวียน ได้อุทิศชีวิตของเธอเพื่อฝึกฝนศิลปะการต่อสู้ขั้นสูงสุด ด้วยพลังในการควบคุมและเปลี่ยนแปลงชี่จากสิ่งแวดล้อม เธอสามารถสร้างเกราะป้องกันที่ชำระทั้งร่างกายและจิตใจ

quote: Release the wants, and the mind quiets. Cleanse the thoughts, and the soul clears.

quoteLocalized.vi: Buông bỏ những ham muốn, tâm trí sẽ thanh thản. Lọc sạch những suy nghĩ, tâm hồn sẽ sáng suốt.
quoteLocalized.th: Lepaskan keinginan, dan pikiran akan tenang. Bersihkan pikiran, dan jiwa akan jernih.
quoteLocalized.id: Lepaskan keinginan, dan pikiran akan tenang. Bersihkan pikiran, dan jiwa akan jernih.

resonanceChain.name: Verdant Branchlet
resonanceChain.description: After casting Intro Skill Essence of Tao, Jianxin gains {0} extra "Chi" from Basic Attacks for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Tao Seeker's Journey
resonanceChain.description: Resonance Skill Calming Air can be used 1 more time.

resonanceChain.name: Principles of Wuwei
resonanceChain.description: After staying in the Parry Stance of Resonance Skill Calming Air for {0}s, Resonance Skill Chi Counter becomes immediately available.

resonanceChain.name: Multitide Reflection
resonanceChain.description: When performing Forte Circuit Heavy Attack: Primordial Chi Spiral, Jianxin's Resonance Liberation Purification Force Field damage is increased by {0} for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Mirroring Introspection
resonanceChain.description: The range of Resonance Liberation Purification Force Field is increased by {0}.

resonanceChain.name: Truth from Within
resonanceChain.description: During Forte Circuit Heavy Attack: Primordial Qi Spiral, if Jianxin performs Pushing Punch, enhanced Resonance Skill Special Chi Counter can be used {1} time(s) in {0}s. Special Chi Counter: Deals Aero DMG equal to {2} of Jianxin's ATK, considered as Heavy Attack DMG. Obtain a Zhoutian Progress 4 Shield (Benefits from Inherent Skill Reflection's bonus effect.)

skills.name: Fengyiquan
skills.description: Basic Attack Jianxin performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG. Heavy Attack Jianxin consumes Stamina to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG. Mid-air Attack Jianxin consumes Stamina to plunge and unleash a powerful kick, dealing Aero DMG. Dodge Counter Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Calming Air
skills.description: Hold Resonance Skill to enter Parry Stance. Chi Counter When Jianxin is attacked in the Parry Stance, she does not take damage and immediately performs Chi Counter, dealing Aero DMG. Chi Parry Release the Resonance Skill button during Parry Stance to interrupt Parry Stance and perform Chi Parry, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Purification Force Field
skills.description: Creates a strong wind field, continuously pulling targets within the wind field to the center and causing Aero DMG. When the wind field disappears, it will cause Aero DMG to all targets within the range again.

skills.name: Formless Release
skills.description: Damage of Resonance Liberation Purification Force Field is increased by 20%.

skills.name: Reflection
skills.description: The Shield obtained with Heavy Attack Primordial Chi Spiral is increased by 20%.

skills.name: Essence of Tao
skills.description: Pull in targets within the range, dealing Aero DMG.

skills.name: Primordial Chi Spiral
skills.description: Heavy Attack: Primordial Chi Spiral When "Chi" reaches max stacks, hold Heavy Attack to cast Primordial Chi Spiral and start Zhoutian Progress. Zhoutian Progress Jianxin's anti-interruption is increased, and her the damage taken is reduced by 50%: Jianxin continuously consumes "Chi" and casts Chi Strike to attack targets nearby, dealing Aero DMG. As Zhoutian Progress accumulates, Jianxin reaches different Zhoutian and gain effects accordingly. Before Minor Zhoutian: Gain Zhoutian Progress 1 shield. When Zhoutian Progress is interrupted, cast Pushing Punch to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG. Minor Zhoutian: Gain Zhoutian Progress 2 shield and cast Shock to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG. When Zhoutian Progress is interrupted, cast Yielding Pull to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG. Major Zhoutian: Inner: Gain Zhoutian Progress 3 shield and cast Shock to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG. When Zhoutian Progress is interrupted, cast Yielding Pull to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG. Major Zhoutian: Outer: Gain Zhoutian Progress 4 shield and cast Shock to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG. When you release Basic Attack button, interrupt Zhoutian Progress and lose all "Chi"; When all "Chi" is consumed, end Zhoutian Progress. When Zhoutian Progress ends, regain a shield according to the Zhoutian Progress you reached; As the shield provided by Heavy Attack: Primordial Chi Spiral persists, restore HP for the on-field character once every 6s. Chi Jianxin can hold up to 120 Chi. Chi is obtained when a Normal Attack Fengyiquan hits the target. Chi is obtained when the Resonance Skill Calming Air is cast. Chi is obtained when the Resonance Skill Chi Counter or Resonance Skill Chi Parry hits the target. Chi is obtained when the Intro Skill Essence of Tao hits the target.

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking
